title: [Whistler's Pass, Bridge]
description: A short cobblestone bridge arches northeast from this hill to the next.  Two stone posts flank the bridge.  Near the top of each post is a place for a fire, which burns softly, covered by an iron grate.
A short cobblestone bridge arches northeast from this hill to the next.  Two stone posts flank the bridge.  Near the top of each post is a place where a fire can be lit and covered by an iron grate.
